SCRIPT.MSCRI:
@echo off :DEFINE &STRING_ARR#,string,30 :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCES
:INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.PARAM_VALIDATION :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_VSS.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECKOUT_LOGGING_PARAM set /a errors=0
! Check SS Utility Path exist :SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = "&UC4RB_VSS_UTIL_DIR#" :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_FILESYSTEM.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_WINDOWS_CONSOLE_FILE_EXISTS if %EXIST% == 0 ( : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "SS Utility Directory" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "Utility directory '&UC4RB_CHECKME#' doesn't exist." : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.ERROR.PARAMETER set /a errors=4 > nul ) if %ISFILE% == 1 ( : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "SS Utility Directory" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "Utility directory '&UC4RB_CHECKME#' existed but is not a directory." : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.ERROR.PARAMETER set /a errors=4 > nul )
!:IF &UC4RB_VSS_USER# <> '' !: IF &UC4RB_VSS_PASSWORD# = '--10' !: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "VSS username/VSS password" !: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "VSS username and VSS password must be specified or left empty together" !: INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.ERROR.PARAMETER ! set /a errors=4 !: ENDIF !:ELSE !: IF &UC4RB_VSS_PASSWORD# <> '--10' !: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "VSS username/VSS password" !: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "VSS username and VSS password must be specified or left empty together" !: INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.ERROR.PARAMETER ! set /a errors=4 !: ENDIF !:ENDIF
! stop execution if validation errors occurred if %errors% gtr 0 ( set retcode=%errors% goto :retcode )
! ensure Working Directory existed cd /d "&UC4RB_VSS_WORKING_DIR#" > nul @if NOT %ERRORLEVEL% == 0 ( mkdir "&UC4RB_VSS_WORKING_DIR#" ) :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_CMDLINE_CMD@WINDOWS
:INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION cd /d "&UC4RB_VSS_UTIL_DIR#" set SSDIR=&UC4RB_VSS_DB_DIR# :SET &COMMAND# = 'ss checkout "&UC4RB_VSS_ITEM#" -I-Y -GL"&UC4RB_VSS_WORKING_DIR#" -C"&UC4RB_VSS_COMMENT#"' :IF &UC4RB_VSS_RECURSIVE# = 'Yes' : SET &COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&COMMAND#,' -R') :ENDIF :IF &UC4RB_VSS_IGNORE_CASE# = 'Yes' : SET &COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&COMMAND#,' -IC') :ENDIF :IF &UC4RB_VSS_USER# <> '' : SET &COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&COMMAND#,' -Y&UC4RB_VSS_USER#') : IF &UC4RB_VSS_PASSWORD# <> '' : SET &UC4RB_ENCRYPTED_PASSWORD_TMP# = "&UC4RB_VSS_PASSWORD#" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.DECRYPT_PASSWORD : SET &COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&COMMAND#,',%UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD%') : ENDIF :ENDIF &COMMAND# :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_CMDLINE_CMD@WINDOWS
